name: The New Generation 1: Young Diamonds - Visual Novel - Fiction - Interactive Story
name_original: The New Generation 1: Young Diamonds - Visual Novel - Fiction - Interactive Story
description:
in a far future earth , few know the demise of their planet in the next 20 years , from them a brain full of madness builds a portal , that transforms the internet into concrete reality . However it comes with a prize. 

Emily Is Alive 

"It started with one, ended with many, the internet is a hobby for most, a world for others, a dimension for some, and a form of reality for a few"- ???

"The Age of the New Generation will never come again, I DiamondHeart will be the supreme leader of this infinite realm, and we shall have peace. After all, who is gonna stop me? The little Wolf?" - DiamondHeart

-This game is a story, a large one, with choices, and different endings. this is a game about a group of friends that fell apart, and now, they are reunited for a greater cause , bigger then them. 

"we will defeat her, we will win, she will lose; let it be known,  we'd rather die burning and screaming in agony than kneel to a  Queen that has for every diamond  residing in her Crown, trapped souls that stood against her in the name of justice, freedom, and courage.   "- Raphael
